title: 2170, Avenue Lincoln, apt. 1007, Montréal (Ville-Marie)
description: Studio in downtown Montréal. Bright open-concept layout with modern finishes including refrigerator, stove, microwave / convection oven, cooktop and dishwasher. Private balcony. Laundry facilities in the building. All utilities and internet included. Quiet building. Just a 2-minute walk to Atwater metro. Walking distance to shops, cafés, universities and services. Advertised price reflects a promotion with 2 or 3 months free amortized over a 12-month lease.
